backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, incidents, stalker profiles, evidence storage, police departments, and user settings with access control and mixed-in authorization/storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature metadata listing two frontend feature changes related to splash messages and mugshot fallback images, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across routing, UI layout, workflows, hooks, and theming.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, themes, dark mode variants, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and setting the page title to Time4jail.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication state, post-login splash logic, profile setup flow, and routing into authenticated or home views.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostLoginSp: Splash screen showing a random message and either a user video or random fallback image, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first-time users to enter a name and save their profile using a backend mutation.
App layout component that renders header, auth controls, settings dialog, main content, and footer while handling login/logout and header height offset.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Modal dialog for updating user settings including theme, tone, language, and motivational video upload with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identity handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, incidents, stalker profiles, evidence, police departments, and user settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables defining multiple color themes, including default, dark, and womenSafety themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint that initializes React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AuthenticatedApp.tsx: Main authenticated interface with tab-based navigation, syncing theme and URL hash while rendering workflow pages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public landing page handling login flow, CTA checks, and redirecting authenticated users toward the incidents workflow.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceReco: Drawer showing detailed evidence info with previews, metadata, and download support based on file type.
Evidence management page allowing users to upload, view, and link evidence files to incidents with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceSumm: Dialog generating, displaying, and exporting an AI‑generated evidence summary in various tones.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentDeta: Drawer displaying incident details including timestamps, report numbers, status, description, and evidence count.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsPag: Page for viewing, searching, sorting, creating, and inspecting incident reports with optional summary and detail drawers.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsSum: Dialog that displays a generated incident summary with options to copy or download it.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/InstallGuide: Provides step‑by‑step installation instructions for adding the app to iOS, Android, and desktop devices.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/MessageGener: Generates customizable cease‑and‑desist messages based on tone and optional incident references with copy and SMS features.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/PoliceDepart: Allows users to find, add, and save police departments, view verified listings, and submit police reports.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/ResourcesPag: Displays national crime‑help resources with contact info and links, plus emergency guidance.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/StalkerProfi: Renders a page for listing and creating stalker profiles, including a form to save new profiles using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/SubmitPolice: Dialog component that generates, previews, and exports a combined police report using incidents, evidence, and selected departments.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/VictimSurviv: Page for viewing, editing, and clearing optional victim/survivor personal information using blockchain-backed storage.
frontend/src/utils/datetime.ts: Utility functions to format bigint timestamps into readable strings and input-friendly date formats.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Creates and triggers a client-side download of plain text content via a generated Blob URL.
frontend/src/utils/files.ts: Validates file size and type, and converts uploaded files to Uint8Array buffers.
frontend/src/utils/generateEvidenceSumma: Builds a styled evidence summary report with tone-based headers, descriptions, and a chronological log.
frontend/src/utils/googleSearch.ts: Opens a new Google search window with a query composed from city, state, and custom terms.
frontend/src/utils/incidentSummary.ts: Generates a multi-section incident summary report with overview, timeline, and basic pattern analysis.
frontend/src/utils/incidentText.ts: Formats a short reference string for an incident including title, report number, and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/landingCtaRegressionC: Checks whether a CTA button is clickable by testing its center and corners for overlaying elements and logs or throws errors during development.
frontend/src/utils/messageGenerator.ts: Generates cease‑and‑desist style messages in varying tones using predefined templates, optionally inserting an incident reference.
frontend/src/utils/policeDeptSaveRegress: Development-only check that warns if a saved police department does not appear in the refreshed list of departments.
frontend/src/utils/policeReport.ts: Builds a police report string including department info, incident summary, and evidence summary using helper generators.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginSplashImages: Provides a pool of fallback mugshot-style images and returns one at random for the post-login splash screen.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginSplashMessag: Contains a set of intense accountability-focused splash messages and returns a random one for display.
frontend/src/utils/smsLink.ts: Creates a cross‑platform SMS link with an encoded message and warns if the message is very long.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, fonts, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, image needs, and current state tracking.
